event: The inaugural Pan American Games began in Buenos Aires, Argentina. This landmark sports event celebrated athletic talent from across the Americas.
Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered the 2022 invasion of Ukraine. This came days after recognizing Donetsk and Luhansk as independent states.
Saddam Hussein began the horrific Anfal genocide against Kurds and Assyrians in northern Iraq. This campaign of systematic extermination resulted in mass atrocities and deaths.
